title: Cannabis retailer MedMen losses narrow to $24 million, as revenue rises
text: MedMen Enterprises Inc. MMNFF, +5.46% MMEN, +4.65% late Monday reported fiscal fourth-quarter net losses of $24.2 million, or 15 cents a share, versus losses of $32.9 million, or 81 cents a share in the year-ago quarter. Revenue for the cannabis retailer rose to $42 million from $20.6 million in the same quarter last year. U.S.-traded shares of MedMen closed up 5.5% to $1.39 Monday. Stock in the California-based company has lost half its value this year, as the ETFMG Alternative Harvest ETF MJ, -1.61% has declined 19%.
